TopicTitle: Is it worth trading in to Gamestop?

Articles.Content: I am thinking about trying trading stuff at GameStop.And was wondering do they give you cash for your trade ins?Would I get a good deal if I trading in consoles like the Psvita and 3DS and the Ouya android console and if they are all in good working order?I have seen a 3DS refurbished for 150$ and if I trade my 3DS in working condition to Gamestop would I get 150$ cash for that trade in?And if GameStop is not good for trade ins?And would you recommend Amazon trade in items instead and would you have to pay for shipping when trading in to Amazon?
It is not. If you bought a new game for 75 euro and handed it back immediately they would probably give you 30 at best.

I don't think they give you very good prices. You can get more money on eBay - provided you're an established seller with good feedback, buyers will be wary when you're a new seller. But you get less hassle with Gamestop.
